snippet: Do voters in a presidential election decide based on an incumbent's record, or who will do a better job the next four years? A good campaign must be prepared to argue its case under both paradigms.
abstract: Do voters in a presidential election decide based on an incumbent's record, or who will do a better job the next four years? A good campaign must be prepared to argue its case under both paradigms.

headline.main: Sept. 6: A Referendum or a Choice?
